comments:
Environment:
------------

Build: Linux 20020416-gtk1x
Java: Sun 1.3.1_02 (Also tried Sun SDK 1.4.0, same result)
Linux: Mandrake 8.2

Problem description:
--------------------

This problem have been present on older editions too.

I have tried to start eclipse in a number of ways, but the startup problem 
persists:

 eclipse
 eclipse -ws gtk1x
 eclipse -ws gtk1x -data /home/sverre/java/workspace

When I start eclipse first time, everything is fine. I add a 
project from my CVS, and it seems to recognize it as a Java project.

I then close eclipse. Next time I attempt to start eclipse I get following 
exception:
